RELIGION

Ramayanam : R. Ramamoorthy, Shirdi Sai Baba Temple, 16{+t}{+h}Street, Thillai Ganga Nagar, Nanganallur, 6.30 p.m..

Gita: R. Aravindan, AI 118 / 18, Creation Ragas Apartments, Eighth Main Road, Anna Nagar, 6.45 p.m..

Vinayagar Agaval: Amaresh Chaitanya, Chinmaya Mission, Harrington Road, Chetpet, 7 p.m..

Kurai Ondrum Illai : Nagai Mukundan, Tirumala Tirupathi Devasthanam, Venkatnarayana Road, T. Nagar, 6.30 p.m..

Thirukural and Silapathikaram: K. Venkatesan, Kanchi Shri Krishna College of Arts and Science, Kilambi, Kanchipuram, 11 a.m.

GENERAL

The Indus Entrepreneur (TIE) Chennai Health Care SIG: Discussion on ‘the new age health care,’ My Fortune Hotel, Cathedral Road, 4 p.m..

Rotary Club of Madras Chennapatna: Awards distribution, Hotel Savera, 6.30 p.m..

University of Madras: Three-day national seminar on death and dying in Indian tradition, F-50 (first floor), Chepauk, 10 a.m.

Bharath University: Ph.D. Scholars’ Meet – 2016, Bharath University Auditorium, Main Campus, Selaiyur, 11 a.m.

Valliammai Engineering College: Lecture on ‘ethical hacking and cyber security’, 9 a.m.; seminar on ‘issues in big data’, Kattankulathur, 2 p.m.

Guru Shree Shantivijai Jain College For Women: Seminar on ‘mantra for self development’, Vepery, 9 a.m..

Saveetha School of Law, Saveetha University: ‘Frames – 2016’, Velappanchavadi, 9.30 a.m..

Periyar Library Reader’s Circle: Dr. C. Natesaanar Remembrance Day, Periyar Thidal, 6.30 p.m..

Narcotics Anonymous: Meetings: St. Joseph High School, Vepery, 7 p.m..

Al-Anon: Meetings: Divine School, Pudur; Santhome Boys Higher Secondary School; CSI Inbarasu Aalayam, Tollgate; Philomina Matriculation School, Injambakkam; Ezhil Nagar Third Street, ‘B’ Block, Kodungaiyur, 7 p.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meetings: Church of Christ, Anna Nagar; Corporation School, Chepauk; Victory Child Development Centre, Selaiyur; Church of Victorious Cross, Ashok Nagar; St. Joseph’s Church, Cholapuram Road, Ambattur; St. Sebastian Church, Madhavaram; Sri Ganapathy Sachidananda Ashram Hospital, Velachery; Christ Church, Porur, 7 p.m.
title: Chennai today
